name: Models & Schemas Example

title: Products API - Sequelize Models Example

header.title: Introduction
header.content: This example demonstrates how to document APIs that use Sequelize ORM models with the @apiSchema annotation in APIDoc v5.

footer.title: About Sequelize
footer.content: Sequelize is a promise-based Node.js ORM for Postgres, MySQL, MariaDB, SQLite and Microsoft SQL Server. This example shows how to integrate Sequelize model definitions with APIDoc documentation.
